question:
NTPC and CPCB signed a MoU to set up air quality monitoring stations at which among the following places of Uttar pradesh?
1. Varanasi
2. Lucknow
3. Allahabad
4. Kanpur
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: National Thermal Power Corporation Limited (NTPC) and Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) signed a MoU to set up air quality monitoring stations (CAAQMS) in Six states and three Union territories. In UP it is going to be set up at Lucknow, Kanpur, Allahabad and Varanasi.
